content: NEW YORK  March 1 Shares of U.S. aviation supply-chain companies have hit turbulence in 2016  and fears of a global recession crimping jet demand could make the sector's ride bumpy for some time to come.
name: Hexcel Corporation
title: U.S. aviation supplier stocks encounter rough skies in 2016
